about_the_game:
This DLC contains original soundtrack and wallpapers for game Cradle.

WALLPAPER SET

Artbook contains ten exclusive wallpapers based on unique sketch artworks.

Wallpaper size: 1920x1080p.

FULL ORIGINAL SOUNDTRACK

Soundtrack contains 90 minutes of music including the meditative ambient, electronic tracks and vocal compositions. It's available in two formats: Lossless FLAC and HQ MP3. Click here to preview.

TRACKLIST

"Cradle - Atmospheres"
········································
01.Opening
02.Laniakea
03.Dream - Mirror Wall
04.Out of Nowhere
05.Dream - Air Flow
06.Ongots Arrives
07.Fatherland
08.Seen Through
09.Warm Stones
10.Dream - Geneva
11.Wind Rises
12.Creepy Eyes pt.I
13.Creepy Eyes pt.II
14.Babylonian Effect
15.Dream - Leaves
16.Providence
17.Dream - Lounge
18.Relic
19.Foreign Letters
20.Past Indefinite (full version)

"Cradle - Stories"
········································
01.Mechanic Heart
02.Universal Value
03.Second Wind
04.Most Beautiful
05.Reflection
06.Advantage
07.Afterglow
08.Leave the Cradle
09.Sea of Youth

"Cradle - Pavilions"
········································
01.Endless Sands
02.Tropical Islands
03.Cloud Country
04.Magic Lakes

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or equivalent AMD
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGl compliant card with 512MB
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

name: Cradle - Soundtrack & Artbook

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: WindowsXP SP3 or higher
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or equivalent AMD
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX9c compliant card with 512MB
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: WindowsXP SP3 or higher
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX11 compliant card with 1GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

short_description: Original soundtrack and wallpapers for game Cradle.
supported_languages:
English*, Russian*, Ukrainian*, Turkish, French
*languages with full audio support
